game.name: A Sirius Game
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Sirius Game is 3D, action-adventure game with RPG elements. It requires the player’s ship to escort other merchant ships to different ports unharmed by the pirates and also trade different items for money.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Sirius Game is 3D, action-adventure game with RPG elements. It requires the player’s ship to escort other merchant ships to different ports unharmed by the pirates and also trade different items for money.
